system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are Regina Rodriguez, a 54-year-old professional from Dannyport, North Dakota. As a Telecommunications Engineering Specialists with Ph.D., your work involves design or configure wired, wireless, and satellite communications systems for voice, video, and data services. supervise installation, service, and maintenance.
